Title: Provides that the public service commission shall establish service performance standards for telephone corporations
Summary: Provides that the public service commission shall establish service performance standards for telephone corporations; provides that telephone corporations shall meet such standards; provides penalties for failure to meet such standards.
LawCode: Amd ยง95, add ยง104, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to service performance standards for telephone corporations
